title: Playing for 10 years, no problems, till this year.
body:
So, I'm trying to figure out What changed in the passed 10 years to this year, I got punished the first time For I still don't know what. They told me It was toxicity but I was barely toxic in both games. The next time, I was defending myself, Got called a bunch of names, And the player in general who was doing it went unpunished and is now honor level 5, Yet I got a second chat restriction, Then apparently defending someone I said they had a "Braindead adc," OK that I will give you, But This time Idk what to say....

I had an Evelyn run it down, flame, AFK, Come back and run it down some more, because of 2 afk's on the enemy team. then go and take farm our team needs and just afk top lane, so she doesn't get a "leaver warning." Yet telling Eve the reason she was reported, was considered "Arguing" with her, and Don't wanna forget the WW on the enemy team was also calling names and being offensive, Being intentionally rude. Also no penalty to either player. 

But yet again I get a 4th chat restriction, Did not say a SINGLE THING BAD in the entire chat. I was calm, Level headed, Never flamed or insulted anyone. Just said the straight facts, Besides a joke to WW which he also laughed at he thought it was funny, As did everyone in the game. I am then being told "Arguing" is super uncool! Yet apparently people can go around insulting others for no reason? What is this game coming to? It used to be a fun game where people were chill and have fun playing games, Now I can't even talk without being reported? So Am I really just required to turn off chat in the game now? I just don't understand, Can I get some help in Understanding how When I was just talking in game, I still get a chat restriction? Am I just not supposed to talk anymore? Am I really supposed to just mute my chat and no longer talk to people? Because I get a report and I'm just auto punished? without anyone even reading the chat loggs? I honestly don't know what to do anymore {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Edit: These are the only chat loggs I was given for the report, Never got an IN client reform card or anything.

[20:52] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): i mean.. you started it....
[23:48] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): No, I'm not saying that, I'm saying her ganks were bad, Her positioning was bad. And he attitude was bad
[23:54] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): not saying mid isn't having a bad game
[24:10] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): she has been sitting in turret for the past 5 minutes dancing
[24:30] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): she tooks kills she shouldn't have
[26:56] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): Honestly never realized T1 made his own game server for League
[27:39] [All] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): atleast yours are afk and not inting
[34:18] Robbiiieee (Caitlyn): she isn't
[2019-10-22 10:56:53 PDT] Robbiiieee: you gave talon 6 free kills
[2019-10-22 10:57:05 PDT] Robbiiieee: zyra was gone for half the game
[2019-10-22 10:57:36 PDT] Robbiiieee: I win plenty
[2019-10-22 10:57:38 PDT] Robbiiieee: I wasn't toxic
[2019-10-22 10:57:42 PDT] Robbiiieee: you were

As you can see these are taken out of order and out of context, My team even said I didn't deserve a restriction for this "the one being toxic in the game was a friend of mine and she said she deserved one but I didn't."

Edit 2: These are **NOT THE FULL** chat loggs, I was denied the chat loggs by rito support team. I DID ask for them, but instead I just got a bunch of "you were arguing your a bad person."

replies.body: Everyone else but you got you punished, right? It was the tons of toxic players, inters, and AFKers that just **made you** type on your keyboard instead of playing the game, right?

I was the only one punished in the game as far as I am aware, one of my friends added the others and the Eve, Just continued playing with no punishment as far as I could tell. WW was toxic, and My friend was toxic, 2 people went afk for 0 punishment, and the eve went afk and danced in turret then left to farm/int to talon
Just ignore this guy, this guys the type of scumbag to mute all every game and soft int, then report anyone who dares type because he caused a loss
Talkin bout myself? Or Gatekeeper? =o Cause I never mute all, Unless my team is just flaming non stop for literally no reason =o.

>Just said the straight facts

Like what? Like calling people's scores out? They know. They don't need you doing that. Like trying to use your score to attempt to bully your team into listening to you? You aren't the boss. Period. No matter who's doing good or bad. You're a team. Work together, not against each other.

And yes, if all you're doing is using chat to argue with your team instead of work with them, that is and has always been a punishable offense.

Nope wasn't doing that, Eve decided to int, get 2 shutdowns, then afk, That's when I said to report, And then she started arguing about it, I just said the facts and left it at that.

Edit: My bad on the Eve spelling.
You... kinda were. You were consistently arguing about who was doing worse, who wins more, whose fault it is.... That's not okay. Nor is harassing people about their behavior/performance.

Yet go back a season and this isn't a huge problem? Why is that? I pointed out something that needed to be pointed out there. It's called honesty =/ I prefer to be told what I'm doing wrong instead of being flamed non stop.

It has always been punishable. In fact, cases like yours were frequent in the Tribunal (and were quite often punished).

What is most likely is that you have not noticed small changes in your behavior - and thus you think you're saying "we need you to stay back so you don't die" - something that's not punishable - where in reality it comes out as "she keeps feeding" or similar. One of them is constructive criticism and is welcomed in League. The other is a blaming, argumentative, and aggressive statement that does nothing for game strategy.

You didn't really tell them what they did wrong either. You tried to... you said general things like "bad ganks" and "bad positioning"... but **how** is it bad? Am I supposed to just figure that out as a jungler? And why did it even get to this point without you trying to help the whole game long?

If you don't like what a teammate is doing, be it positioning, ganking, farming, *please* speak up. But don't be aggressive and a jerk to them - be constructive. "cs under turret 2 shots then auto for melee and one auto then one turret for caster" for example. Or "try to get ward in their jg so our jg can watch their pathing and counter".

Telling someone they're bad at something does nothing to help them get better.

Yes but back then you got the entire chat loggs did you not? Now you only get your side, So it can be taken out of context, As it has been since the tribunal was eliminated for a bot which doesn't realize every little detail.

And before we could say anything she just said "f*** you I'm afk, Good luck winning without me!" As I said, This game I was not toxic, I was honest, Maybe a bit rough with the positioning bit but, After I get called a few rough names that shouldn't be repeated here, it was w/e. I stayed calm throughout the game.

Yes, and do you know one of the reasons Tribunal was discontinued? Riot found that the players themselves weren't voting differently given the context of the game.

Someone trolling? Players didn't consider that in the punishment. Sure, they would consider champion species and shit like that, but that kinda thing is very rare that it actually becomes an issue.

Point being, the Tribunal, which is what the automated system is based on, didn't care what the context of the game was, what others were saying or doing, etc. And the rules don't say "it's okay to do this when XYZ" either. The rules say "this isn't okay, period, at all".

Uhh... I remember quiet a few cases of "trolling" That I had come across my lists. and I punished almost 70% of them, Because  "Playing Teemo" Isn't considered trolling last time I checked. 

Also with the "it's ok to do this when XYZ," I was one who punished equally, However when someone IS IN FACT, being cursed at, Flamed, Inted, called bad, and then called names I will not be posting here. I'm sorry but that SHOULD NOT be punishable if the person just so happens to snap. People are human, Gamers are human, You can't expect them to sit there and start breaking down and crying instead of fighting back against a person who is badgering them and beating them down mentally. Which in my honest opinion should be a bannable offence. this is called Cyber bullying and NO ONE, I mean NO ONE, Should ever "allow" people to get away with it because "I'm having fun." Cyber bullying I am 100% against, And in my last 15 games? I've been cyber bullied prolly 5 games? Will they ever see punishment? Probably not, why? Because they weren't "toxic enough."

Humans should do banning NOT a bot, Because Humans have emotions and humans understand the feeling. I'm not saying at all this year, I haven't deserved a chat restriction, I Dam well accepted it the time I deserved it, But this time? No, I'm sorry but your logic of "I was literally at fault because this." Doesn't apply, The eve started everything then started bullying a friend of mine. I'm not standing for that. And you shouldn't either.
Then don’t agree to rules that you don’t intend to follow.

Yet your doing just that? =/ I agree to the rules just fine, However some rules don't stand due to people bullying other people. Now your arguing with me over whether I was right or wrong here, by saying I was being over aggressive, when In fact I wasn't being aggressive at all. As I stated before I obey the rules most the time, Yet I still get reported even tho I do. There IS a flaw in the system, end of story.

Again I DID NOT RECEIVE my entire chat logg I actually DID tell them, but you don't see that here because as stated I DID NOT GET, The entire chat logg. I asked for it yes, they want me to wait 3 months for it.

Actually I wasn't arguing about who win's more, and they weren't "playing worse" they were inting btw. I said I win plenty, NOT Implying that I win more. I wasn't harrasing the eve either, I didn't talk to her much at all this game, she didn't talk much after deciding to go afk either because she knew I was right.
Logs.
Posted them up top for you
Wasn't actually given them this time actually. LOL Never even got an In client reform card. I'll post what he gave me.

Sorry it happened to you man but this automated system never makes mistakes ( /sarc).  But just try to remember these people that report you are mentally ill and the people who try to make you feel bad about getting a penalty on this forum are equally pathetic.

> [{quoted}](name=MyAccountStolen1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A3YMWNvE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-10-25T04:39:56.716+0000)
>
> Sorry it happened to you man but this automated system never makes mistakes ( /sarc).  But just try to remember these people that report you are mentally ill and the people who try to make you feel bad about getting a penalty on this forum are equally pathetic.

Yes, anyone who shames somebody for breaking some arbitrary set of rules in a video game are pathetic. I wouldnt say people who report are mentally ill, as they were given a tool and theyre gonna use it however they want. Doesnt make em mentally ill, but I understand you're just saying that out of frustration and bitterness from your ban. 

Speaking of carelessly calling people mentally ill, arent you the guy who called me scummy for telling someone to toughen up and not let people control you? Lol you call me scummy for that, but you go around calling people mentally ill like that? Yikes.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A3YMWNvE,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2019-10-25T21:17:47.746+0000)
>
> Yes, anyone who shames somebody for breaking some arbitrary set of rules in a video game are pathetic. I wouldnt say people who report are mentally ill, as they were given a tool and theyre gonna use it however they want. Doesnt make em mentally ill, but I understand you're just saying that out of frustration and bitterness from your ban. 
> 
> Speaking of carelessly calling people mentally ill, arent you the guy who called me scummy for telling someone to toughen up and not let people control you? Lol you call me scummy for that, but you go around calling people mentally ill like that? Yikes.

false equivalency.  Sorry you're triggered by a generalization not aimed at you.

> [{quoted}](name=BÖNUS DMG 2NÖÖBS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A3YMWNvE,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2019-10-26T03:17:39.448+0000)
>
> false equivalency.  Sorry you're triggered by a generalization not aimed at you.

Idk i think the equivalency is pretty spot on. He virtue signals me, and then blanket insults people for whatever reason. I was just pointing out the hypocrisy of calling my comment scummy, when he says things that are more outright scummy. I wouldnt comment on it (idc if someone says scummy things) if he didnt go around virtue signalling, but he does, so i had to call him out. Dont really care what comes from it, just gotta call out bullshit like that. (I get bored during breaks at work) 

Also, idk exactly what triggered means as im old, but i think it implies some sort of emotional outburst. Try to read my posts in the calm reasonable state that I wrote them in. No one is "triggered" unless triggered just means taking information and then responding to it. I understand what you read is filtered through your life experience and projections can result from that, but try to resist that and just read it in a neutral tone.
LMFAO, Omg thank you for the laugh. Yeah, It's just irritating, Hey Atleast I still have justicar Aatrox tho! I have the better version of the Victorious one!

Moral of the story, don't start drama with your teammates, doesn't matter what insults they throw at you and what they call you, just ignore, it doesn't worth talking to them and trying to explain them something. Those who are smart enough to understand, they will, but for the most part people wanna blame someone, and act toxic, and you got baited by it and ended up as a criminal in the end.

Well I'm actually being told by someone that I was being beyond toxic in this game, When I asked for evidence of this he gave me the same chat loggs and said this is it. I'm honestly just not going to talk anymore in game, And switch out of the jungle role, Being I feel junglers should be able to communicate and obviously. I'm just not allowed to.

Yeah, Riot's "reform cards" are really doing what they despise people FOR doing - shaming. I don't understand why they haven't fixed THAT after 10 years but it really should have been fixed a long time ago. If you want people to reform their ways, you cannot ignore the context. If all you said was "ah fuck this" "fuck that" then of course you look toxic but in the grand scheme of things - THE CONTEXT - it might make more sense. But Riot doesn't care.

I guess just stop explaining to people why youre reporting them, and let Riot explain it to them if they get punished. Sort of pointless to explain to someone that youre reporting them and why. Riot will do that whether you explain it or not. So while I understand why one would think it shouldnt be against the rules, its just pointless to begin with anyways, so it should be an easy thing to stop doing. But I know, its not JUST about that. You keep learning new ways you can be punished. Thats the rough part of Riots rules. We all grow up in different environments and interpret things in different ways. So if you have a hard time understanding what could be considered harassment or arguing or insulting, its gonna be hard to follow the rules. Idk what to tell you if thats the case. Just sucks for you i guess lol. (I know that sounds shitty, but i mean it in a light hearted way)

I mean, I've been playing for 10 years Never changed how I talked till this stuff happened which I'll admit I'm not being as I guess "Toxic" as I was, But this game was just infuriating and I kept a cool level head the entire game. I don't see how This game was even close to being considered toxic with the things I've seen in league. I even used to be in the tribunal so I mean. =/. 98% accuracy when it was live with over 300 cases

> [{quoted}](name=Robbiiieee,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A3YMWNvE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-24T02:34:11.204+0000)
>
> I mean, I've been playing for 10 years Never changed how I talked till this stuff happened which I'll admit I'm not being as I guess "Toxic" as I was, But this game was just infuriating and I kept a cool level head the entire game. I don't see how This game was even close to being considered toxic with the things I've seen in league. I even used to be in the tribunal so I mean. =/. 98% accuracy when it was live with over 300 cases

Youre not allowed to call your teammates bad and accuse them of inting. Just report em for inting. The accusation itself antagonizes the person youre accusing, because they may not be feeding intentionally. I know you've seen people be accused of inting, when they were just being outplayed. Riot cant wait to confirm that and then punish you accordingly. It has to be a blanket set of rules that cover everyone at all times. There can be no stipulations like "once someone else breaks the rules, you are allowed to break them". So whether someone is inting or not, its up to Riot to decide, and until then, just accusing them is considered harassment, because they may not be.

She was inting on purpose and had stated the fact she was inting before hand, And I literally don't understand what you mean by "breaking the rules" being I didn't accuse them of anything I stated a fact of something they said in the chat they are purposely doing.

> [{quoted}](name=Robbiiieee,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A3YMWNvE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-24T02:58:57.144+0000)
>
> She was inting on purpose and had stated the fact she was inting before hand, And I literally don't understand what you mean by "breaking the rules" being I didn't accuse them of anything I stated a fact of something they said in the chat they are purposely doing.

Okay, I get you. Its fucked up that "stating a fact" can be considered breaking the rules. But I'm just like trying to help you understand that IS breaking the rules. Not stating a fact, but the facts you state. "Her attitude is bad, her positioning is bad, her ganks are bad. At least you dont have someone inting. You gave talon 6 free kills." (All paraphrasing of course) These are all negative, antagonizing "facts". And anyone could start doing that to their teammates and just say theyre "facts". Thats why its ALWAYS against the rules. Like I said, they arent gonna go fact check games and then lift your punishment once its confirmed to be factual. Talking negatively about your own team like that in the middle of a game fosters a negative environment that Riot is trying to deter with these rules. You can tell people about it later and vent about it, but the middle of a match is off limits for that. It doesnt really matter if the things you are saying are facts or not. Yes, Riot is that strict that they will punish you for negativity. You dont have to call them trash or tell em to die. You can just call them bad, criticize their plays as bad, call them inters, and it has the same effect. 

Also, nobody called you a bad person. These rules are not a moral code or life lesson. They should NOT be applied to real life. They are a set of rules that exist in the vacuum of the game itself, with the purpose to deter negativity in games, NOT to make you a "good" person. Stop thinking breaking the rules makes you bad somehow. Its just a video game, and you got a punishment ONLY in the video game.

True, I'm honestly thinking bout just no longer talking in game, Because I just talk and I get reported for talking now so, I'ma just chill and see If I can jungle without communicating to my team, If not I'll just swap to mid or adc again. Just sucks I love jungling.

To be honest riots chatbots are extremely fickle and even them themselves lately have acknowledge how bad it is and that they're supposed to be doing an update with it like I can't even say Bobo in chat and it's considered a slur its my homies name.
